definition: mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: He’d fractured his rib and hip.
sentences.chinese: 他折断了胸骨和髋关节。

sentences.english: This is the phenomenon of so-called "function compensation"of muscle in hip joint.
sentences.chinese: 即，髋关节肌有所谓“功能补偿”的现象。

sentences.english: He was hipped when he dropped from the tree.
sentences.chinese: 他从树上跌落了下来，把髋关节摔脱了臼。
敲膝盖或髋关节异常旋转。

sentences.english: "Cemented" total hip replacement has been performed in the dog for over 30 years.
sentences.chinese: “水泥”全髋关节置换已履行了狗了30多年。

sentences.english: Conclusion The method above is a good treatment to non- infective fever after hip joint substitution.
sentences.chinese: 该方法对髋关节置换术后非感染性发热有较好作用。

sentences.english: Keep hips flat on floor. Keep head in line with spine.
sentences.chinese: 保持髋关节平贴地面，保持头部与脊柱位于同一直线。

sentences.english: Hip extensor peak torque strength of the relative growth rate is larger than the flexors.
sentences.chinese: 髋关节伸肌相对峰力矩力量增长幅度比屈肌要大。

sentences.english: There are therefore many reasons to take-down a hip fusion.
sentences.chinese: 因此，有许多理由接受了髋关节融合。

sentences.english: Dr. Saba Saba had a hip fracture and ended up having a hip replacement.
sentences.chinese: 沙巴医师曾有过骨折，最后替换髋关节。

sentences.english: The principal muscles involved in hip flexion are the psoas and the iliacus, collectively known as the iliopsoas .
sentences.chinese: 主要涉及肌肉，在髋关节屈曲的腰肌和髂，统称为髂。

sentences.english: The entire ilium and hip joint can be reached through the iliac part of the incision.
sentences.chinese: 整个髂骨和髋关节都可以通过本切口的髂骨部分到达。

sentences.english: You've inflamed the fascia in your hips, the flexible fibers in the joint.
sentences.chinese: 这说明连接腿和髋关节的非常灵活的纤维发炎了。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect of allogeneic bone nail on fracture dislocations of hip joint.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨同种异体骨钉治疗髋关节骨折脱位的疗效。

sentences.english: Only arcs and straight-lines form figures of hip joint prostheses.
sentences.chinese: 采用圆弧和直线形成髋关节股骨侧假体外形轮廓。

sentences.english: To evaluate the treatment of idiopathic chondrolysis of the hip in children.
sentences.chinese: 观察儿童特发性髋关节软骨溶解症的疗效。

definition: thoracic vertebra/the twelve thoracic vertebras behind the ribcage of humans and most mammals
articular capsule (of joint such as knee in anatomy)
sacrum (anatomy)/bone forming the base of the spinal column
